properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v11 v12 v13 v14 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus want me to follow him

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He wants me to serve and obey

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He alone can wash me from sin

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And help me serve Him each day

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I want to please Him more than anything

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: I want to known as the daughter of the King

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: The kings's daughter oh glorious within

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Pure and white washed from sin

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: I want to be just like Him

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: He's making me oh glorious within

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Though I'm so young and very small

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Right now os the time to begin

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: To give to the Lord my life my all

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: He calls me to come unto Him
